Boats Animator

A free stop motion animation program

For Windows, OS X and Linux

Features

Boats Animator is an open source frame capture program that has been created to provide a powerful and easy to use alternative to the ageing existing free programs. Its intuitive interface caters to animators of all levels and offers many powerful features. The program has been open sourced under the GNU General Public License and contributions are welcome to the project’s active GitHub repository.

Instant Playback Onion Skinning Active Development
Instantly preview your captured frames with Boats Animator. Unlike other programs, there is no need to wait for the frames to process. This professional feature helps keep your animations smooth by showing you a translucent version of the last image captured. New features are always being added to Boats Animator and your suggestions are very welcome.
